description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Overview of the position
              
              The core responsibilities will involve the repair, service, installation and commissioning of Tetra Pak
              
              processing equipment at customer sites. You will be able to manage your own workload and work
              
              unsupervised whilst maintaining a high level of service excellence.
              

              Descriptions:
              
              • Interface with customers to establish and maintain continuous positive relationships.
              
              • Support customer on daily operation, process and technical issues.
              
              • Carry out installation/commissioning/upgrading/maintenance of Tetra Pak processing equipment.
              
              • Maintains and administrates customer files, reporting responsibilities for maintenance activities.
              
              • Work with Technical sales to promote maintenance services, parts, components & equipment sales.
              
              Participate in technical service project in pre-project and implementing stage

requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              • minimum 2 years Experience as Automation engineer
              
              • Having experience in field instruments, industrial networks, control system.
              
              • Having strong automation background /experiences about Allen Bradley/Siemen software programming and automation project development, Wonderware software (InTouch).
              
              • The candidates must have experiences about Wonderware System platform, Database (MSSQL) and S88/S92 integrated system
